channel.title: Chuck Lorre on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Chuck Lorre on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Leanne’ Review: Leanne Morgan’s Chuck Lorre-Produced Netflix Comedy Is a Reliably Nice Time
item.description: The standup comedian stars as a 50something woman who’s just been dumped by her husband of three decades, alongside an ensemble cast including Kristen Johnson, Ryan Stiles and Celia Weston.

item.title: Gina Yashere Talks Life After Losing Home in L.A. Wildfires: “The Universe Gave Me a Good Kick”
item.description: “I took it as a message I need to be outside of America right now,” the ‘Bob Hearts Abishola’ star said at the Just For Laughs festival.
